channel.title: Help with removing "RuneScape" Logo on client background
channel.description:
Hello I need help on how to remove the "RuneScape" logo on the top of my client background.
FYI! It's not in the actual background image either. I have changed the background and it still remains.
Idk how to remove it.
Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Help with removing "RuneScape" Logo on client background
item.dc:creator: @neonscapeftw neonscapeftw
item.description:
@neonscapeftw wrote:

You need to use a program called Toms’ Cache editor, there are lots of different tuts on using this program. Its pretty self explanatory anyways. You need to have a background with the same dimensions as the current background already to prevent the image getting cropped.
Hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: Help with removing "RuneScape" Logo on client background
